Text: Many thanks: you are a great source for classic Italian stuff - the best by far. Saw something on another dl of yours about a virus (in Swedish?) I ran several checks and it came up clear.

I was bored with porn and dumped all my collection of 100s of movies.  Nothing touched the spot anymore.  Then I discovered you and classic Italian porn.  Beautiful women, intelligent plots, high production values and men who don't look like bodybuilders. You've made an old man very happy.
